title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.34 - Operation of tank vehicles restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.34 - Operation of tank vehicles restricted

State Regulations

No tank vehicle shall be operated in or upon the airport
unless prior written approval as to equipment, construction, condition and
contents is given by the airport operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
